p: In a similar pattern, benzaldehyde (#21) and methyl salicylate (#42) appeared to be upregulated in the LRGwT (galls with inducing thrips inside) composite as compared to the cLRG. Moreover, sesquiterpenes, such as δ-muurolene (#67), β-elemene (#58) and α-caryophyllene (#63), decreased in the composites of galls from which the galling Nexothrips were removed (cLRG) (Figure 8).
